data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 1,874,847 people in Patiala who are far from you. Please add 379 new house churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Patiala, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Patiala, Punjab, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Patiala to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Patiala, Punjab, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jat Johal people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let those from the 20,853 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Patiala, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Patiala, Punjab, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

location.name: Patiala
location.people_groups_list: Bodla, Jat Chhadar (Hindu traditions), Jat Godara, Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions), Jat Bhainwal
